Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Understand the Goal The user wants me to analyze three cases based on a provided event log and specific normative rules strict versus desiderata recommended but not strict I need to identify violations suboptimal behaviors and provide interpretations justifications Analyze the Normative Constraints Part 1 Sequence Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case Strict Order Credit Check before Risk Assessment Risk Assessment before Loan Decision Inform Applicant after Loan Decision If loan approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case No Finalize Documentation after Rejection Whats Not Allowed Skipping steps changing order contradictory actions Analyze the Desiderata Part 2 Timing Credit Check within 24 hours of Application Inform Applicant within 48 hours of Decision Followup Preferable to perform a Followup Call before closing Note Violating these is not serious

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze Case 1 Log 0900 App Rec 0930 Credit Check 1000 Risk Assessment 1100 Loan Decision Approved 1300 Inform Applicant 1330 Finalize Documentation 1400 Close Case Normative Check Sequence Followed perfectly Order correct Condition met Violation None Desiderata Check Credit Check within 24h yes Inform within 48h yes Followup Call not in log desiderata violation Interpretation Case 1 is a perfect adherence to strict rules The only issue is missing a followup call

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze Case 2 Log 0800 App Rec 0820 Risk Assessment Violation 0900 Credit Check Violation 0930 Loan Decision Rejected 1000 Finalize Documentation Violation 1030 Close Case Normative Check Ordering Rule Risk Assessment before Credit Check violates strict order Risk Assessment before Loan Decision okay but Credit Check violation major Condition Rejected but Finalize Documentation before close direct violation Desiderata Check Credit Check within 24h yes Inform Applicant missing from log entirely Followup missing

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Analyze Case 3 Log 0900 App Rec 20240114 1000 Credit Check Happened more than 24 hours later desiderata violation 1100 Risk Assessment 1200 Loan Decision Approved 20240116 1500 Inform Applicant Later than recommended 48 hours desiderata violation 0900 Finalize Documentation 1000 Close Case Normative Check Sequence App Credit Check Risk Assessment Decision Info Finalize Close looks correct activities follow path Timing messy but logic holds no logical sequence violation Desiderata Check Credit Check not within 24h no Inform Applicant delay as per prompt Followup missing

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: SelfCorrection on Case 3 Timing Credit Check 3 days later desiderata Inform Applicant labeled as violation in prompt SelfCorrection on Case 2 Sequence Risk Assessment before Credit Check strict violation Finalize Documentation after Rejection strict violation

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Synthesize and Structure the Response Structure Case 1 Analysis Normative Desiderata Case 2 Analysis Normative Desiderata Case 3 Analysis Normative Desiderata General Interpretations Justifications Drafting Content Case 1 Normative Compliant Desiderata timing compliant missing Followup Case 2 Normative Two violations Risk before Credit Finalize after Rejection Desiderata timing ok missing Inform missing Followup Case 3 Normative Compliant sequence Desiderata Credit delay Inform delay missing Followup Interpretations Case 2 System error manual override admin error Case 3 Human inefficiency resource constraints

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Refining the Output Make sure to clearly distinguish Normative Violation Strict and Desiderata Violation Best practice Use exact phrasing SelfCorrection details Final Polish Case 1 Perfect normative Only missing followup desiderata Case 2 Multiple normative violations Timing ok missing info desiderata Case 3 Normative adherence Timing delays desiderata missing followup Justification Case 2 data entry error manual override Case 3 resource bottlenecks Generate final response
